objects.specification: A large rectangular floor with a neutral light wood texture featuring medium‐width planks, subtle natural grain and a matte finish to create a warm, inviting base for the classroom.
A flat rectangular ceiling panel painted in matte white with a smooth finish, providing a clean overhead surface for mounting lights and a projector.
A tall rectangular back wall painted in a soft pastel blue with a smooth matte finish to foster a calm learning atmosphere.
A tall rectangular front wall painted in a gentle pastel green with a smooth matte finish, creating a soothing backdrop for the teacher’s area.
A tall rectangular left wall painted in a pastel yellow tone with a smooth finish to maintain a bright yet calming environment.
A tall rectangular right wall painted in a soft pastel pink with a smooth matte finish, enhancing the calm classroom ambiance.
A large executive desk in a rich dark wood tone with subtle grain detail, a rectangular top featuring a cable management grommet, and sturdy panel legs for a professional appearance.
A high‐back swivel chair upholstered in smooth black leather with a padded seat and backrest, adjustable height and tilt mechanisms, and a five‐star base with casters.
A large rectangular whiteboard with a smooth glossy white writing surface, framed by thin anodized aluminum and mounted with concealed brackets.
A compact ceiling‐mounted projector in a matte white housing with an adjustable lens, ventilation grilles, and a discrete mounting bracket.
A slim rectangular LED ceiling light panel with a diffused white acrylic cover, flush‐mounted to provide bright, even illumination.
A slim rectangular LED ceiling light panel with a diffused white acrylic cover, flush‐mounted to provide bright, even illumination.
A slim rectangular LED ceiling light panel with a diffused white acrylic cover, flush‐mounted to provide bright, even illumination.
A slim rectangular LED ceiling light panel with a diffused white acrylic cover, flush‐mounted to provide bright, even illumination.
A slim rectangular LED ceiling light panel with a diffused white acrylic cover, flush‐mounted to provide bright, even illumination.
A tall wooden bookshelf in a matching dark wood tone, with five evenly spaced shelves filled with multicolored books and a few decorative accents.
A large rectangular window with clear glass panes and adjustable horizontal blinds in a neutral tone, framed by slim aluminum profiles.
A round wall clock with a white face, black hour markers and hands, and a thin metal frame for clear time display.
A potted plant featuring a warm terracotta pot and lush green foliage with broad leaves, showing natural detail and a slightly glossy finish.
A potted plant featuring a warm terracotta pot and lush green foliage with broad leaves, showing natural detail and a slightly glossy finish.
A simple cylindrical waste bin in matte dark gray plastic with an open top and sturdy construction.
A simple cylindrical waste bin in matte dark gray plastic with an open top and sturdy construction.
An educational poster with engaging illustrations and vibrant colors, laminated finish, in a rectangular format to add visual interest.
An educational poster with engaging illustrations and vibrant colors, laminated finish, in a rectangular format to add visual interest.
An educational poster with engaging illustrations and vibrant colors, laminated finish, in a rectangular format to add visual interest.

A simple rectangular student desk with a light wood finish, slender black metal frame, slightly rounded edges, and an integrated under‐desk shelf.
A student chair with a slender black metal frame, light wood seat and backrest, and a colored upholstered cushion pad for comfort.
